
```
choose the zip/tgz matching your platform, uncompress and start

java >= 1.6 needed

experimental:

'oscc_lin32' and 'oscc_lin64' are experimental single-file executables based on bskt (https://github.com/7890/bskt)
chmod 755 oscc_lin32; ./oscc_lin32
it will put the application to a temporary directory (mktemp -d) and then start it.
after closing the program, the temporary directory will be cleaned up.
 
```
